Text: (NASDAQ:CSCO) SVP Irving Tan sold 22,896 shares of Cisco Systems stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, September 17th. The stock was sold at an average price of $49.42, for a total value of $1,131,520.32. Following the sale, the senior vice president now owns 154,819 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $7,651,154.98.
